name: Binary Planets
description:
This game was created for the ScoreSpace Jam #18 having following requirements:

  • Implement leaderboard system (preferably with LootLocker)
  • Game concept should be easily adapted for mobile device
  • Theme: Magnetic
  • Time Limit: 29.4.2022 10 PM - 2.5.2022 10PM

These as the inspiration I designed a game specifically for a mobile platform in mind even though for the Jam version of the game I decided to keep in WebGL. The game was designed to simple to start playing but increasingly difficult when trying to achieve higher score. The leaderboard system was implemented with LootLocker.

The theme "Magnetism" is included in the game trough the interaction between the planets and other game elements. Even though in a narrative sense there is no magnets in the game the interactions are heavily inspired by how magnets behave.

CREDITS
lrdazrl

DrPetter's sfxr tool was used to create most of the sound effect
Shift asset package was used for sprites and one sound effect.
LootLocker leaderboard system was implemented based on their documentation and tutorial. I had completed a part of tutorial before the jam start time so part of the code for leaderboard  scripts is based on "premade asset".
